column5: I read on the net that EA has ceased publishing its magazine. I hope its just a rumor. Its is and was the finest muskie/pike/walleye magazine. Top quality articles and  pictures. Someone clear it up if possible.
Yes, sadly the magazine is finished... forever I don't know.  But for now, yes.  Very much enjoyed reading and writing for EA and wish all those involved a future full of big toothy fish.
Dang, that stinks big time....hope it finds it's way back...  Maureen
Too bad, my three favorite species! Not quite as high on itself as Musky Hunter I think, but I bought both...
that sux i can only take so much of mr saric
